REUTERS.UNKNOWN: M f1481 reute u f BC-AMAX-ZINC-CO-RAISES-D 06-29 0057

TEXT.TITLE: AMAX ZINC CO RAISES DYECAST ALLOY PRICES
TEXT.BODY: Amax Zinc Co, a division of Amax Inc, said it is increasing the price of dyecast alloys No. Three and No. Five by three cents a lb, effective immediately. Dyecast alloy No. Three is now 52.5 cents a lb, while alloy No. Five is now 53.5 cents a lb, the company said. Reuter
